user_question: What are the top three destinations for stargazing in the world and generate an image of the Milky Way over one of these locations?
final_answer: The top three destinations for stargazing are Mauna Kea in Hawaii, Atacama Desert in Chile, and Aoraki Mackenzie International Dark Sky Reserve in New Zealand. Image of the Milky Way over Mauna Kea generated. Best times to visit: Mauna Kea - April to September, Atacama Desert - March to December, Aoraki Mackenzie - June to August.
